==== useBeforeDeclaration_jsx.tsx (0 errors) ====
    namespace JSX {
        export interface Element {}
    }
    
    class C {
        static a = <C.z></C.z>;
        static b = <C.z/>;
        static c = <span {...C.x}></span>;
        static d = <span id={C.y}></span>;
        static e = <span>{C.y}</span>;
        static x = {};
        static y = '';
        static z = () => <b></b>;
    }
